long_description: The Bison Designs Rec D belt features an attractive pattern of brown, tan, navy and olive. Muliticolored nylon jacquard webbing catches the eye. 2 rectangular zinc D rings let you adjust the fit; buckle features an antique nickel finish. Size Medium fits up to a 38 in. waist; size Large fits up to a 42 in. waist. Belt can be cut to any length; for best results visit your local REI and ask a sales associate for help with a heat knife.
short_description: The Bison Designs Rec D belt features an attractive pattern of brown, tan, navy and olive.
